Type.Name: TextEventHandler

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void TextEventHandler(object o, TextEventArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed TextEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the TextEventHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the TextEventHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the TextEventHandler is removed from the event.
